title: Minimalist Scandinavian Loft in Bike-Friendly Podgórze
description: Step into clean lines and airy light in this modern Scandinavian loft. Featuring 1 spacious bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, an additional full guest bathroom, and smart storage solutions throughout, this 65 sqm loft offers effortless living. High ceilings expand the feel of the open-plan dining and living zone, with large windows creating a living space full of natural light. Included is a coveted private parking space for your comfort.
neighborhood_description: Podgórze blends vibrant local life with green spaces and bike-lined streets, offering students easy access to both relaxation and recreation. Urban living meets authentic community with trendy cafés, local shops, and excellent public transport connections across Krakow. Bike paths wind along the nearby river, perfect for quick commutes or scenic rides.
lifestyle_benefits: minutes to campus by public transport and bike
walking distance to cafes and riverside parks
ideal for entertaining and quiet study
target_buyer: Student or young professional desiring a modern, low-maintenance home in a stylish building close to universities and amenities.
market_positioning: A unique, ready-to-move-in loft for those seeking an alternative to traditional apartments—in a lively neighborhood at mid-range Krakow prices, with rarely available parking and design-led minimalist style.
